content:
```
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mine at position (-25.0, -62.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (-25.0, -62.0).

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0).

### Iron smelting setup at position (-25.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (-25.0, -60.0).

### Iron storage and transport at position (-26.5, -58.5)
Consists of an iron chest at position (-26.5, -58.5), a burner inserter at position (-26.5, -59.5) that puts items into the chest, and a transport belt at the drop position of the burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5).

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to place the entity before placing it.

### Errors when crafting
- Ensure you have all the required ingredients to craft an item. If a sub-ingredient needs to be crafted, ensure you have the necessary machines and resources for that sub-ingredient. In this case, iron plate needs to be smelted in a furnace before crafting an iron chest.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

# NAMESPACE

No new functions were defined in this step.
```
